org.waarp.gateway.ftp.config

Class FileBasedConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.ftp.core.config.FtpConfiguration
      • org.waarp.gateway.ftp.config.FileBasedConfiguration

  • public class FileBasedConfiguration
extends org.waarp.ftp.core.config.FtpConfiguration
    FtpConfiguration based on a XML file
    Author:
    Frederic Bregier
